name: Philosophies of Elegance
description: Talent Level-Up material.\nElegance is the form of the nation of thunder.\nElegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance â€” that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.
domain: Domain of Mastery: Thundering Valley IV
